mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectBookingNoComboBoxItems*/ BOOKING_NO CD, --Invalid column name 'BOOKING_NO'. BOOKING_NO CD_NM --Invalid column name 'BOOKING_NO'. FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND STAT_CD = 'AP' AND CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV')

SELECT DISTINCT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectShipgNoteNoComboBoxItems*/ SHIPG_NOTE_NO CD, SHIPG_NOTE_NO CD_NM FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND STAT_CD IN ('AP') AND CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV') ORDER BY SHIPG_NOTE_NO

WITH GI_INFO AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems GI_INFO*/ VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD, COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_GI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (GATE_IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND GATE_IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD ), WH_IN AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems WH_IN*/ (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.CG_WGT) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS CG_WGT, (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.CG_VOL) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS CG_VOL, (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.PKG_QTY) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS PKG_QTY FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GW', 'WW') ), HI_INFO AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems HI_INFO*/ VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD, COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_HI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD )

WITH GI_INFO AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems GI_INFO*/ VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD, COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_GI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (GATE_IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND GATE_IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD ), WH_IN AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems WH_IN*/ (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.CG_WGT) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS CG_WGT, (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.CG_VOL) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS CG_VOL, (ISNULL (CAST (SUM (J.PKG_QTY) AS FLOAT), 0)) AS PKG_QTY FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GW', 'WW') ), HI_INFO AS ( SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems HI_INFO*/ VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD, COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_HI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, IX_CD ) SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectCargoItems*/ COUNT(*) FROM () AS TEMPTB

SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectGateInItems*/ D.VSL_CD, D.CALL_YEAR, D.CALL_SEQ, D.VSL_CALL_ID, D.MF_DOC_ID, D.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS CG_NO, D.CHAS_NO, D.SEQ AS RORO_SEQ, D.IX_CD, S.CATG_CD, D.NEW_YN, D.CG_TP_CD, D.DOC_WGT, D.CBM, B.BRAND_CD, M.MODEL_CD, FORMAT (R.GATE_IN_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS GATE_IN_DTM, '' AS GR_NO, R.DRIVER_ID, R.DRIVER_NM, R.DRIVER_LICENSE, ISNULL (R.TRUCK_NO, '') AS TRUCK_NO, R.PLAN_LOC_ID, '' AS GATE_TICKET_NO FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S INNER JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE_DTL D ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = D.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = D.SHIPG_NOTE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_RORO_MST R ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = R.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.CG_NO AND D.CHAS_NO = R.CHAS_NO AND D.SEQ = R.RORO_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_BRAND B ON D.BRAND_CD = B.BRAND_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_BRAND_DTL M ON D.MODEL_CD = M.MODEL_CD AND D.BRAND_CD = M.BRAND_CD
WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.STAT_CD IN ('AP') AND S.CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV') AND D.IX_CD = 'X' AND (D.CHAS_NO IS NOT NULL AND D.CHAS_NO <> '')
AND (R.IN_DTM IS NULL OR R.IN_DTM = '') AND (R.LOADING_DTM IS NULL OR R.LOADING_DTM = '')
AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}
ORDER BY R.GATE_IN_DTM, R.CHAS_NO
SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectJobGroupNo*/ ISNULL( MAX( CAST(S.JOB_GROUP AS INT) ) , 0) + 1 AS JOBGROUP FROM TMT_JOB S WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
mapper.update: UPDATE /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.updateCorrectionNoForGR*/ TMT_GR SET UNIT_NO = #{correctionNo}, UPD_DT = SYSDATETIME(), --Invalid column name 'UPD_DT'. UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} --Invalid column name 'UPD_USER_ID'. WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND GR_NO = #{grNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertUnitCorrectionForRoRo*/ INTO TMT_RORO_UNIT_CORRECTION ( -- Invalid object name 'TMT_RORO_UNIT_CORRECTION'. VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, VSL_CALL_ID, DOC_NO, CG_NO, RORO_SEQ, SEQ, ORG_UNIT_NO, CORRECTION_UNIT_NO, STAFF_CD, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{vslCallId}, #{bookingNo}, #{shipgNoteNo}, #{roroSeq}, (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TMT_RORO_UNIT_CORRECTION -- Invalid object name 'TMT_RORO_UNIT_CORRECTION'. WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND RORO_SEQ = #{roroSeq}), #{unitNo}, #{correctionNo}, #{userId}, SYSDATETIME() )
mapper.select:
SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectGateInItemsHHT*/ R.VSL_CD, R.CALL_YEAR, R.CALL_SEQ, R.VSL_CALL_ID, R.MF_DOC_ID, R.CG_NO, R.CHAS_NO, --Invalid column name 'CHAS_NO'. R.LOC_ID, R.PLAN_LOC_ID AS yardLoc, R.RORO_SEQ, --Invalid column name 'RORO_SEQ'. FORMAT(R.GATE_IN_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS GATE_IN_DTM, FORMAT(R.IN_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS IN_DTM, FORMAT(R.OUT_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS OUT_DTM, ISNULL ((SELECT DISTINCT TOP 1 C.GR_NO FROM TMT_GR C WHERE C.VSL_CALL_ID = S.VSL_CALL_ID AND C.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) , ' ') AS GR_NO, WB.DRIVER_ID, --Invalid table name 'TMT_WEIGHTBRIDGE'. R.DRIVER_NM, R.DRIVER_LICENSE, ISNULL(WB.TRK_NO, '') AS TRUCK_NO,--Invalid table name 'TMT_WEIGHTBRIDGE'. R.PLAN_LOC_ID, WB.GATE_TICKET_NO --Invalid table name 'TMT_WEIGHTBRIDGE'. FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S INNER JOIN TMT_RORO_MST R ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = R.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.CG_NO
INNER JOIN TMT_WEIGHTBRIDGE WB --Invalid table name 'TMT_WEIGHTBRIDGE'. ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = WB.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = WB.SN_NO
WHERE R.GATE_TICKET_NO = WB.GATE_TICKET_NO AND S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.STAT_CD IN ('AP') AND S.CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV') AND R.IX_CD = 'X'
AND (R.GATE_IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R.GATE_IN_DTM <> '') AND (R.IN_DTM IS NULL OR R.IN_DTM = '')
AND (R.GATE_IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R.GATE_IN_DTM <> '') AND (R.IN_DTM IS NULL OR R.IN_DTM = '')
AND (LOADING_DTM IS NULL OR LOADING_DTM = '')
AND R.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}
ORDER BY R.GATE_IN_DTM, R.CHAS_NO --Invalid column name 'CHAS_NO'.

SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.selectGateInTimeSeq*/ MIN(AD.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV AD WHERE AD.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND AD.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (AD.GATE_PASS_NO IS NULL OR AD.GATE_PASS_NO = '')
mapper.insert:
SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertHIJobItems*/ ('J' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') + RIGHT('000000000' + ISNULL(CONCAT(MAX(CAST(RIGHT(JOB_NO, 9) AS INT)) + 1, ''), '000000000'), 9)) AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB
INSERT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertHIJobItems*/ INTO TMT_JOB ( JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, WORK_ST_DT, WORK_END_DT, SHFT_ID, PKG_TP_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, STAT_CD, CG_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CALL_SEQ, VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, JOB_PURP_CD, DELV_TP_CD, OPE_CLASS_CD, SHU_YN, TO_LOC_ID, SHFT_DT, JOB_GROUP, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, TSPT_TP_CD, JOB_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, REPKG_TYPE_CD, LORRY_NO, DRIVER_ID, GATE_TXN_NO, CHAS_NO ) VALUES ( #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInStDtStr}, 103), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInEndDtStr}, 103), DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInEndDtStr}, 103), ''), -- MISSING 1 PARAM #{pkgTpCd}, #{pkgQty}, #{msrmt}, #{wgt}, #{statCd}, #{grNo}, #{vslCallId}, (SELECT MF_DOC_ID FROM TMT_GR WHERE GR_NO = #{grNo}), #{callSeq}, #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{jobPurpCd}, #{delvTpCd}, #{catgCd}, (CASE WHEN (#{shuYn} IS NULL OR #{shuYn} = '') THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'N' THEN 'N' END), #{locId}, DBO.F_GET_SHFT_DATE(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInEndDtStr}, 103)), #{jobGroup}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{jobCoCd}, #{spCaCoCd}, #{rePkgTpCd}, #{lorryId}, #{driverId}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{unitNo} )

SELECT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertHIArrvDelvItems*/ J.JOB_NO AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND J.JOB_CO_CD = #{jobCoCd} AND ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD, ' ') = ISNULL(#{spCaCoCd}, ' ') AND J.RHDL_MODE = 'R'
INSERT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertHIArrvDelvItems*/ INTO TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV ( CG_NO, CG_IN_OUT_CD, SEQ, CG_WGT, CG_WGT_UNIT, CG_VOL, CG_VOL_UNIT, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, CG_TP_CD, GATE_IN_DT, GATE_OUT_DT, TSPT_TP_CD, GR_NO, LOC_ID, LORRY_NO, GATE_PASS_NO, GATE_PASS_ISSUE_DT, ISSUE_CNT, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD CALL_YEAR, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD CALL_SEQ, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD VSL_CD, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD JOB_NO, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{shipgNoteNo}, #{cgInOutCd}, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(MAX(SEQ) AS INT), 0) + 1 FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} ), #{wgt}, #{wgtUnit}, #{msrmt}, #{msrmtUnit}, #{pkgQty}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{cmdtCd}, #{cgTpCd}, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInStDtStr}), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInEndDtStr}), #{tsptTpCd}, #{grNo}, #{locId}, #{lorryId}, #{gatePassNo}, SYSDATETIME(), (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ISSUE_CNT), 0) + 1 FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND LORRY_NO = #{lorryId} ), SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{vslCallId}, #{mfDocId}, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD #{vslCallYear}, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD #{vslCallSeq}, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD #{vslCd}, -- NOT NULL, MUST ADD #{jobNo}, #{newVersion} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.updateHIArrvDelvItems*/ TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV SET CG_WGT = #{wgt}, CG_WGT_UNIT = #{wgtUnit}, CG_VOL = #{msrmt}, CG_VOL_UNIT = #{msrmtUnit}, PKG_QTY = #{pkgQty}, PKG_TP_CD = #{pkgTpCd}, CMDT_CD = #{cmdtCd}, CG_TP_CD = #{cgTpCd}, GATE_IN_DT = CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInStDtStr}), TSPT_TP_CD = #{tsptTpCd}, GR_NO = #{grNo}, LORRY_NO = #{lorryId}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId}, VERSION = #{newVersion} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND LORRY_NO = #{lorryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.insertHIGeneralGateIn*/ INTO TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV ( CG_NO, CG_IN_OUT_CD, SEQ, CG_WGT, CG_WGT_UNIT, CG_VOL, CG_VOL_UNIT, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, CG_TP_CD, GATE_IN_DT, TSPT_TP_CD, GR_NO, LOC_ID, RMK, LORRY_NO, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, VSL_CD, JOB_NO, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{shipgNoteNo}, #{cgInOutCd}, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(MAX(SEQ) AS INT), 0) + 1 FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} ), #{wgt}, #{wgtUnit}, #{msrmt}, #{msrmtUnit}, #{pkgQty}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{cmdtCd}, #{cgTpCd}, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInStDtStr}), #{tsptTpCd}, #{grNo}, #{locId}, (CASE WHEN #{gatePassNo} IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN #{gatePassNo} = '' THEN NULL WHEN #{gatePassNo} = ' ' THEN NULL ELSE #{rmk} END), #{lorryId}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{vslCallId}, #{mfDocId}, #{vslCallYear}, #{vslCallSeq}, #{vslCd}, (CASE WHEN #{jobNo} IS NULL THEN ( SELECT J.JOB_NO AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD = #{jobPurpCd} AND J.JOB_CO_CD = #{jobCoCd}) ELSE #{jobNo} END), #{newVersion} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*confirmHandlingInOfRORO.updateHIGateInLorry*/ TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV SET GATE_IN_DT = CONVERT(DATETIME, #{hdlInStDtStr}), TSPT_TP_CD = #{tsptTpCd}, LORRY_NO = #{lorryId}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATETIME(), STAFF_CD = #{userId}, VERSION = #{newVersion} WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND SEQ = CAST(#{seq} AS INT)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMT_JOB_DTL ( VSL_CD, CALL_SEQ, CALL_YEAR, VSL_CALL_ID, MF_DOC_ID, CG_NO, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, SEQ, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, SHIPG_NOTE_NO, GR_NO, DMG_YN, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, RMK, RORO_SEQ, LORRY_NO, DRIVER_ID, STEVEDORE_ID, GATE_TXN_NO, CHAS_NO, RHDL_NO ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callSeq}, #{callYear}, #{vslCallId}, #{bookingNo}, #{grNo}, #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, #{roroSeq}, 1, TRY_CONVERT(NUMERIC(15, 3), ISNULL(#{cbm}, 0)), TRY_CONVERT(NUMERIC(15, 3), ISNULL(#{docWgt}, 0)), #{shipgNoteNo}, #{grNo}, CASE WHEN #{dmgYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} ='N' THEN 'N' END, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{rmk}, #{roroSeq}, #{truckNo}, #{driverId}, #{stevedoreId}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{unitNo}, #{rhdlNo} )
